item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: All CME + NASDAQ option settlements need around 10G gas / sec, which is only ~100x from current node performance. Can get there even faster with a couple simple application-based optimizations.
That’s why @derivexyz is built on a @conduitxyz rollup. Riding the right tech waves. 🏄
item.dc:creator: @josh_pwrk
item.description:
All CME + NASDAQ option settlements need around 10G gas / sec, which is only ~100x from current node performance. Can get there even faster with a couple simple application-based optimizations.

That’s why @derivexyz is built on a @conduitxyz rollup. Riding the right tech waves. 🏄

nitter.freedit.eu/jessepollak/status/1869795727544856807#m
